body_html:
I have similar problem.

In generated with cmake .sln file tf_tutorials_example_trainer.vcxproj tensorflow works fine, but linking tensorflow in existing project (same code as in tf_tutorials_example_trainer) gives error "No session factory registered for the given session options".

When i use /WHOLEARCHIVE and tensorflow .lib files in existing project (console release x64) - Error:
/WHOLEARCHIVE = Error LNK1000: Internal error during IncrBuildImage

Details of problem: #6382

Maybe some separate Cmake / Visual Studio example projects linking tensorflow .lib files exist (to stop rebuilding tensorflow each time)?

body:
I have similar problem. 

In generated with cmake .sln file tf_tutorials_example_trainer.vcxproj tensorflow works fine, but linking tensorflow in existing project (same code as in tf_tutorials_example_trainer) gives error "No session factory registered for the given session options".

When i use /WHOLEARCHIVE and tensorflow .lib files in existing project (console release x64) - Error:
/WHOLEARCHIVE = Error LNK1000: Internal error during IncrBuildImage

Details of problem: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/6382

Maybe some separate Cmake / Visual Studio example projects linking tensorflow .lib files exist (to stop rebuilding tensorflow each time)?
